headline: Dive Deposits: 4 reminders that it’s not 2022 anymore
summary: The closure of Citi’s we-hardly-knew-ye office in Málaga, Spain – combined with moves to preserve overdraft fees and toughen in-office requirements – make it clear that if 2025 threw a party, 2022 would not be invited.

headline: Citigroup Hires Robert Lighthizer, Trump’s Former Trade Czar
summary: Citigroup  hired President Trump’s former trade chief,  Robert Lighthizer,  to advise the bank and its clients on how to navigate the new administration’s global trade war.  Lighthizer, who served as the head of the U.S. Trade Representative between 2017 and 2021, is a well-known hawk when it comes to tariffs.  Lighthizer started his new job just before Trump’s tariff plans and subsequent pause upended corporate strategy plans and sent markets into turmoil.
